problem_text_cn: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,CE平分∠BCD交AD边于点E,且DE=3,则AB的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, CE bisects ∠BCD and it intersects the AD edge at point E, and DE = N_0, then the length of AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=DC,AD∥BC,∴∠DEC=∠BCE,∵CE平分∠DCB,∴∠DCE=∠BCE,∴∠DEC=∠DCE,∴DE=DC=AB=3,故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形性质,平行线性质,角平分线定义,等腰三角形的性质和判定的应用,关键是求出DE=DC=AB．
